metadata.title: CVE-2021-4213 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in JSS, where it did not properly free up all memory. Overtime, the wasted memory builds up in the server memory, saturating theserverâ€™s RAM. This flaw allows an attacker to force the invocation of anout-of-memory process, causing a denial of service.

criterions.comment: jss package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
